snippet: Best known for his recurring appearances on hit shows like “The Dick Van Dyke Show” and “The Mary Tyler Moore Show,” Mr. Schaal was also a writer and an early member of Second City in Chicago.
abstract: Richard Schaal, an actor, writer and first-generation member of Chicago improvisational theater company Second City, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Best known for his recurring appearances on hit shows like “The Dick Van Dyke Show” and “The Mary Tyler Moore Show,” Mr. Schaal was also a writer and an early member of Second City in Chicago.

headline.seo: Richard Schaal Dies at 86; Known for Physical Comedy
headline.main: Richard Schaal, TV Actor and Second City Veteran, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Richard Schaal, 86, Actor on TV and in Clubs
